subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Motor vehicle racing barriers and guard rails must be provided so as to comply with the following:

ol.li: Motorsport Australia Track Operators Guide for Motorsport Race Venues.

For stock car racingâ€”
on the outer margin of the track: a continuous concrete, close boarding or long guard barrier having a minimum height of not less than 900 mm; and
on all curved sections of the track within 3 m of a barrier described in (i): a stout welded or woven wire mesh fence adequately supported having a height of not less than 1.8 m above adjacent spectators viewing areas; and
between the public viewing area and the fence described in (ii): a suitable crowd barrier that will prevent spectators entering within 1.2 m of that fence.
